title: [BUG] Elise Sounds
body:
Happend on EUW,

Elise doesn't make the "Q" sound if she's in spider form. The sound of her R, if she's swichting forms only play ~50% of the time.
Bug is reproduceable in every game.

replies.body:
Hey Nimium Simplex! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.
This is same happened to me in spider form q w e no sounds.

me too in my game now im so angry :@@@@@@@@@
{{champion:60}} please fix it or bring it back
